question:
[Brandi] decided to give her uncle, [Reynaldo], a call on his birthday. [Michael] went to his brother [Mark]'s Birthday party [Martha] asked her husband [Spencer] to take out the trash. [Spencer] took it out quickly so he could get back to the game. [Spencer] would n't let his son [Michael] go to the park by himself. [Michael]'s brother [Mark] offered to go with him. [Michael] likes to sing with his brother [Peter]. [Peter]'s sister [Brandi] hates when they sing.
Question: How is [Reynaldo] related to [Martha]?

Step 3: Look for indirect relationships that can help us infer the relationship between [Reynaldo] and [Martha]:

Step 4: Based on the relationships identified, we can infer that [Reynaldo] is the brother of [Martha].
